channel.title: Help with Ints and Model Number?

item.title: Help with Ints and Model Number?
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

Ok so i made a really nice staff and i want to release it and put it in my server but I’m stuck.

I have made it from .dat and .gzipped it and I’m stuck there. I know i have to have my own ants and model number but I am really confused with it like for the ints am i supposed to come up with my own hoping it will work or do i base it of something and the model number? I have no clue what I’m doing and I tried learning from tutorials but no one has a actual tutorial on it. I have tried Google and Search nothing from what I have seen.

Some one helped by telling me that if its a weapon Copy and Paste the Bandos Godsword ints i tried that and it didn’t work so I’m thinking that i have to come up with my own ints and model number. So this is as far i have gotten

if(i == 15334){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 7354;//item look class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7355; class8.anInt200 = 7244; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bandos godsword "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A great weapon, used by the best warriors.".getBytes();

That is the Bandos Godsword ints and what not. From my understanding and I hope I am right is that these

class8.anInt174 = 7354;//item look
class8.anInt165 = 7355
class8.anInt200 = 7244

Have something to do with the model number. Problem is i don’t know what the model number is for my weapon and i don’t know how to find out

That’s pretty much all I have learned from just looking and comparing Model numbers and other ints.

I really need help for this because I really want to learn. I have gotten really good at creating items on Meta and I want to learn how to release them.

Anyone help? please and thx

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Ints and Model Number?
